DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate visual outcome , contrast sensitivity , glare induce high order aberration induce new CustomVue software use wavefront-guided LASIK .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Outcomes Following LASIK Surgery Using CustomVue
DOC.criteria: Myopia 0.00 6.00 D Astigmatism 0.00 3.00 D Manifest refraction spherical equivalent ( MRSE ) 6.00 D. History ocular pathology Previous ocular surgery Large pupil ( great 8mm diameter , infrared measurement ) Thin cornea ( preoperatively calculate minimal residual bed < 250 um ) Irregular astigmatism Asymmetric astigmatism Unstable refraction Any condition precludes patient undergoing LASIK
